Text: If you have requests on 40k books just leave a comment about it and I'll try to get it uploaded ASAP.
The Horus Heresy books 19,20 and 22, in Epub, would be cool.. And thx for this one.
Please tell me the titles as depending on if you take in account Anthologies and Novellas the book # will change.
kk, they're called: "Know No Fear", "The Primarchs" and "Shadows of Treachery"
